item.title: Baker Hughes Delivers Growth as Energy Tech Expands
item.description: Baker Hughes tops Q3 estimates as LNG and energy tech orders surge, boosting margins and cash flow ahead of the Chart Industries acquisition

item.title: Fal.Con Europe Could Be CrowdStrike’s Early Earnings Catalyst
item.description: CrowdStrike’s Fal.Con Europe event may offer investors an early look at earnings momentum and product adoption ahead of November results

item.title: IBM's Pullback: A Bullish Signal Hidden in Plain Sight
item.description: The market’s focus on a single metric caused a stock pullback that overshadowed IBM's financial results and its new strategic AI hardware partnership.

item.title: Logitech Eyes Breakout Before Earnings—Citigroup Sees 30% Upside
item.description: Logitech stock is up 33% in 2025 and could climb higher as Citigroup upgrades the stock ahead of earnings, citing innovation and tariff flexibility

item.title: 3 Regional Bank Stocks That Crushed Q3 Earnings
